subpages.title: Telephone Interviews
subpages.summary: Typically focused on the competencies that the recruiter is looking for and used to determine which applicants to invite to a face-to-face interview

subpages.title: Face-to-Face Interviews
subpages.summary: Face-to-Face interviews involve the employer explaining the job and asking some questions

subpages.title: Panel Interviews
subpages.summary: These interviews are conducted by a group of interviewers, who take turns to ask questions

subpages.title: Video Interviews
subpages.summary: Applicants are presented with questions and asked to record their response, often within a time limit
